Foyo Face Mo' Mellow Face Mask (2020 formulation)

Brand: Foyo Face

Category: Mask

Ingredients: Kaolin Clay, Cacao, Whole Dry Milk, Honey, Avocado Seed.

Directions: Mix 1 TBSP each of mask and water. Stir to make a paste. Apply to clean damp face. Leave on until dry. Rinse and pat dry. Repeat 1-2 times a week.

Ingredient concerns: LOW: Cancer,
book: 2001-Foyo Face Mo' Mellow Face Mask (2020 formulation)
